title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 40-2.0 - Scope of Subpart 40-2
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 40-2.0 - Scope of Subpart 40-2

State Regulations

In accordance with applicable provisions of Article 6 of the Public Health Law, this Subpart establishes standards of performance and minimum requirements for core public health services relating to Family Health, Communicable Disease Control, Chronic Disease Prevention, Community Health Assessment, Environmental Health, and Emergency Preparedness and Response. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
40-2.0

Amended, New

York State Register December 31, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
